titles.title: DEFEAT Robocalls Act of 2019
To increase the penalties for certain robocall, spoofing, and telemarketing violations.
DEFEAT Robocalls Act of 2019
Double the Enforcement and Fines of Everyone Associated with Terrible Robocalls Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Double the Enforcement and Fines of Everyone Associated with Terrible Robocalls Act of 2019 or the DEFEAT Robocalls Act of 2019
This bill increases fines for robocall, spoofing, and telemarketing violations. Additionally, the bill reduces the amount that must be in controversy to give rise to a private right of action and allows a person bringing such an action to obtain twice the amount of damages sustained.
